item.title: Blog How to Enable Folder Share in Kali VM and Windows Host
item.description: This comprehensive guide shows you how to seamlessly mount your Windows folder in a Kali Linux VM using VMware and open-vm-tools. Enhance your virtual machine experience with step-by-step instructions and troubleshooting tips.
